attributes.action: Give  social and affordable housing preference to people who have made significant UK tax contributions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margaret Hodge has proposed that British families to be given housing priority over immigrants.  We recognise this could be seen as unfair and propose that housing preference be given to those people who have already made a significant UK tax contribution.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
